title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using a dynamic text element to display content from a database field, the Content Type property does not have any effect. Regardless of whether it is set to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report displays the same results. The expected behavior is as follows:
OB: Currently, the report displays the same results regardless of the Content Type setting.
EB: For the Content Type set to Plain, I expect the literal content (including any tags) to be displayed. For Auto, I expect the content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags. For HTML, I expect the content 1 and 2 to appear properly without any HTML tags, and the content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Prepare a database field with three types of content:
   a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags
   c) Text with RTF tags
2. Create a report with a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Set the Content Type property of the dynamic text element to Auto.
4. Run the report and observe the displayed results.
